text: 1903 (MCMIII) was a common year starting on Thursday in the Gregorian calendar and a common year starting on Wednesday in the Julian calendar. == Aer, music, theatre, literature == * Edwin S. Porter's The Great Train Robbery is released. == Events == * December 17 – Orville Wright of the Wright brothers flies an airplane at Kitty Hawk, North Carolina. * Abeerden Football Club founded in Scotland. == Births == === January === === February === * February 8 – Tunku Abdul Rahman, Prime Minister of Malaysia (d. 1990) === March === * March 24 – Adolf Butenandt, German chemist (d. 1995) === April === === May === * May 3 – Bing Crosby, American singer and actor (d. 1977) === June === * June 21 – Al Hirschfeld, American caricaturist (d. 2003) * June 25 – George Orwell, English writer (d. 1950) === July === * July 2 – Alec Douglas-Home, Prime Minister of the United Kingdom (d. 1995) === August === === September === === October === === November === === December === == Deaths == * May 8 – Paul Gauguin, French painter nv:1901 – 1950
